cab.content: ufemcrandum for the Cabinet by the First. Lord of the Admiralty,I only desire to say in reforence to the -letter addressed to the Jrime Minister by MreAdamson (C.P.2091) that while I was at tho Colonial Office I had information both as regards the subject matter of the speeches made by Archbishop Mannix and as to the effects produced In Australia, and they certainly would not Justify the statement made by Mr*- Adams on,(Intld.) W. H. L.14th November,1920.
